main_definition: Enough; adequate in amount or quality to meet a particular need or requirement.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Adequate for the purpose at hand
meanings_and_examples.example: I have sufficient time to finish my homework before going out.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Great enough in number or quantity to meet a specific need
meanings_and_examples.example: We have sufficient staff members to handle this project.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Able to supply adequately; having more than what is required
meanings_and_examples.example: The charity had sufficient funds to support the community for the year.
His score was sufficient to pass the exam, but not enough for an A grade.
